snippet: Known as Segue 2, the galaxy consists of just 1,000 stars.
abstract: Dr James Bullock study in Astrophysical Journal reports that galaxy on edge of Milky Way known as Segue 2 may be smallest known galaxy in universe, consisting of just 1,000 stars held together by clump of dark matter.
lead_paragraph: Known as Segue 2, the galaxy consists of just 1,000 stars.

headline.print_headline: Astronomy: Dwarf Galaxy May Be Answer to Predictions
headline.main: Dwarf Galaxy May Be Answer to Predictions
